profile.name: Molindu Achintha
profile.title: Full Stack Developer & ML Engineer
profile.bio: Computer Science undergraduate at the University of Moratuwa passionate about using AI, machine learning, and data analytics to solve real-world problems. Experienced in building solutions in computer vision, NLP, gaze estimation, and predictive modelling through internships and industry projects. Motivated to create technology that helps people, improves efficiency, and brings new ideas to life.

projects.title: 3D MRI Super-Resolution
projects.description: A deep learning project focused on enhancing the resolution of 3D MRI scans using GANs (Generative Adversarial Networks).
projects.long_description: This research project aims to improve medical imaging diagnosis by generating high-resolution 3D MRI volumes from low-resolution inputs. It utilizes advanced computer vision techniques and deep learning models to preserve anatomical details.

projects.title: Verdex Mobile App
projects.description: Mobile app for farmers to detect crop diseases and get recommendations.
projects.long_description: Developed a mobile application enabling farmers to upload crop images, detect diseases, and access solutions from a knowledge base. Deployed a trained ML model on AWS EC2 for disease prediction and used Gemini 2.0-flash free API for solution recommendation.

projects.title: Diabetic Retinopathy Detection Using Fundus Images
projects.description: Machine learning classifier to detect diabetic retinopathy from fundus images.
projects.long_description: Trained a classifier using combined outputs from InceptionNet and ResNet models. Applied SMOTE for class imbalance and multiple data augmentation techniques to improve model performance.

projects.title: SIIM-ISIC Melanoma Classification Using Transfer Learning
projects.description: Used transfer learning for melanoma detection from dermoscopic images.
projects.long_description: Implemented a modified InceptionNet B7 architecture for melanoma classification. Applied preprocessing including DICOM to grayscale conversion, denoising, contrast enhancement, and segmentation.

projects.title: Multimodal Sinhala Fact-Checking RAG System
projects.description: Agentic AI system for verifying Sinhala-language news and social media content.
projects.long_description: Built a multi-agent Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system for Sinhala misinformation detection. Agents handle claim extraction, linguistic processing (tokenization, NER, transliteration), evidence retrieval from trusted sources, reasoning, and verdict generation. System outputs verdicts like True, False, Partially False, Misleading with justifications in Sinhala.
features: Agentic AI workflow with multiple agents

projects.title: Sinhala Idioms Extraction and Translation
projects.description: Extracted Sinhala idioms from text and translated them into equivalent English idioms.
projects.long_description: Collected and processed Sinhala texts using OCR from books and other sources. Built a dataset of Sinhala idioms and mapped them to legitimate English idiomatic expressions for NLP applications.

experience.description: Developed two gaze-controlled therapeutic games for integration into the BrainGaze Focus platform to support ADHD and ASD therapy.
responsibilities: Integrated games into BrainGaze Focus platform
Supported ADHD and ASD therapy applications

experience.role: Machine Learning and R&D Engineering Intern
experience.description: Adapted and enhanced eye-tracking analysis tools to extract and analyze vergence and pupil signals from video and ARKit data, demonstrating reliable oddball-task responses and improving gaze-point estimation accuracy.
responsibilities: Extracted vergence and pupil signals from video and ARKit data

experience.role: Project Lead - Machine Learning and R&D
experience.description: Leading ML and R&D projects including CMS (Content Management System) - an agentic-AI-powered system that automates end-to-end workflow of creating, organizing, and distributing content across users and teams. Also developing Continuity Checker - a computer vision system that detects continuity mismatches between shots.
responsibilities: Building Continuity Checker computer vision system
Detecting continuity mismatches in film production

experience.description: Tested the film-production scheduling algorithm and enhanced it by integrating a clustering module based on scene proximity.
responsibilities: Integrated clustering module based on scene proximity

experience.description: Lead the AI team at our startup to build next-generation agentic-AI learning platform with personalized, RAG-powered tools for students and teachers.

education.degree: B.Sc. in Computer Science and Engineering
education.description: Undergraduate program focusing on Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Software Engineering. Gaining practical experience in AI, data analytics, and computational problem solving.

certifications.name: iOS & Swift - The Complete iOS App Development Bootcamp
Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification
Natural Language Processing with Classification and Vector Spaces
Introduction to TensorFlow for AI, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning
